about_the_game:
The Game

 Venture into a magical world as Rad, the town’s local butthole, begrudgingly completes his community service. His magical powers and unlockable abilities allow him to traverse all kinds of locations with ease. Venture into the unknown using Rad's floating gloves to hover and grapple around obstacles and his electrical magic to perform incredible acrobatics. Take on kick-ass bosses, like the Synergy Sisters, as Rad unintentionally foils their plans.

The Story

 In the town of scenic Vistabell, a rebellious youth named Rad finds himself in a bind with the law. As having to complete community service wasn't bad enough, he has a run-in with a mysterious thief who has the ability to erase magic - the world's life source. In order to repay his debt to society, Rad is tasked with tracking down the thief, collecting the powerful McGuffinite crystals, and fighting the sinister Synergy Sisters.


Features

Venture into a variety of locations and settings on your way to completing your community service:
  • Explore an expansive and evolving hub world, unique exploration levels, and challenging boss gauntlets.
  • Walk from one level to the next with no loading screens.
  • Fast-Travel Teleporter Pads get you where you've already been instantly!



Having floating hands can be useful, utilize them to the fullest with unique platforming abilities:
  • Chain together sprints, jumps, hovers, and grapples to help you traverse the world.
  • Discover collectables, take on challenges, and unlock new abilities to help you on your adventure.
  • Upgrade your abilities and gadgets to explore more treacherous locations.



But wait, there's more!

  • Take on obstacle courses and combat challenges in the Augmented Reality Arena.
  • Face-off against challenging boss battles.
  • Unlock unique and hilarious alternate outfits.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes references to alcohol consumption and tabaco smoking. General violence with minor blood. Depictions of child abuse.

name: Rad Venture

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Atos criminosos

short_description: A radical 3D Platformer about exploring fantastic locations using floating gloves and electrifying abilities!
